The audio clip begins with a male speaker explaining the concept of "contrast ratio," defining it as the difference in brightness between the lightest and darkest areas of an image. He speaks in a clear, informative tone, noting that a high contrast ratio creates a dramatic look while a low ratio creates a soft, natural look.
